column4: hello all, I want to change my own pict to the default pict of the desktop appearance, do you know what type of pict format ? is it jpeg or else ?
I belive its svn if you are talking about the Apperance icon
i think its svg file format
if I have the pict of jpeg how do I convert it to svg
hmm...I open it, then Ubuntu 8.10 does not recognize it
Download and install Inkscap image editor it can read and save in SVG formats
do you the link of download Inkscape vector ?
if you are running ubuntu just search for it in add/remove
is the name listed exact as Inkescape ...?
bazhang has an easier way if you cant find it, but when i search under all for "inkscape" it is the only result
